text: Stav Strashko (, born September 24, 1992) is an Israeli model and actress."Trans Model Stav Strashko On Why She’d Rather Live Without Definitions". Teen Vogue, May 27, 2016. She is most noted for her performance in the 2018 film Flawless, for which she became the first openly transgender actress ever to receive an Ophir Award nomination for Best Actress."In first, trans actress is candidate for Israel’s top film prize". The Times of Israel, September 3, 2018. Strashko was born in Dnipropetrovsk, Ukraine, and from the age of two raised in Israel. She currently resides in Tel Aviv."Meet the Israeli Trans Model Breaking Ground as Proenza Schouler’s New Muse". Vogue, April 19, 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Israeli film actresses Category:Israeli female models Category:LGBT entertainers from Israel Category:Transgender and transsexual actresses Category:Transgender and transsexual models Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian emigrants to Israel Category:Actors from Tel Aviv
title: Stav Strashko
